AuthorName.Content: M Han, L Wang, J Chang, B Li, C Zhang - arXiv preprint arXiv:2409.08512, ;2024Software projects are dependent on many third-party libraries, therefore high-risk vulnerabilities can propagate through the dependency chain to downstream projects.
